title: Didn't get any ranked rewards from last season
body: At the beginning of december I got silver 4 and so the season ended and i haven't gotten any rewards. I didn't even get my border, the main thing I was looking forward to.

replies.body: Hmmmm there's actually a small chance your account could have been missed when the rewards were going out, as I'm not seeing any punishments or your rewards being removed. Please make sure you reach out to our game agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so they can look deep into this and A) get you those rewards if needed and B) figure out why this happened!
Did you get any punishments during last season before season end? I.E Chat restrictions/Temp bans? If so that is probably why you didn't get rewards because your account was under watch for reform.
